comment: She was absolutely amazing! She was very easy going and didn't make the class super tough. There are only four papers along with a couple other smaller grades and she is a super easy grader. I would definitely take her again!

Mrs. Wilson is very nice, but she was unclear with what she wanted from our essays. I wish that she had a more structured way of grading. Most of the people who complain are the ones who never go to class. Go to class ask questions and just try and get the best understanding of what she wants. Would take again if the circumstances arise.
rating_tags: Tough Grader--Get ready to read--Participation matters

comment: I tried to give her a chance but she is actually the worst professor ever. None of her dates in the syllabus matched when things were actually due, and she never told us anything. She is a really tough grader. I took all AP English classes throughout high school and never got below a 95 and she wrote all my papers were "too wordy". DO NOT TAKE HER
She is so vague on every essay she gives you so you will have no idea what to write.
rating_tags: Tough Grader--Gives good feedback--GRADED BY FEW THINGS

comment: Ok, at first I didn't know what to think. The first rating was from the first few weeks and that we are at the end, TAKE HER.  She treats us like we are college-level.  Just do the work. She's really good and cares if we learn. That's all.
I loved her class and wanted to take her again, but can't.

The most frustrating part about this class is every paper she made us write she never gave us strict instructions on how we're supposed to write our papers. Yea, 12 font TNR & MLA is all fine and dandy but HOW am I supposed to write a paper when theres such vague instructions. Caused me HELLA writers block. Wish KSU didn't switch my professors :(
rating_tags: Get ready to read--Participation matters--SO MANY PAPERS
